values: 院子；庭院；码（长度单位）；帆桁；横杆；（铁路车站的）调车场；（牲畜的）围栏；作业场地；（尤指足球场的）码线
把…运至场内；把…堆积在院子里；把…驱入圈栏；使…进入畜栏

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 码数；按码计算；火车站内栏舍之使用费

word_group.brief_definition: 细高啤酒杯内的啤酒量
集装箱堆场；集装箱场；集装箱后方堆场
修理场；修理工场；修理厂
垃圾场；废品场；垃圾回收站

bilingual.source: The yard was also a little bit messy.
What animal does Helen see in the yard?
bilingual.target: 海伦在院子里看到了什么动物？

bilingual.source: What plants does Peter see in the yard?
bilingual.target: 彼得在院子里看到了什么植物？

bilingual.source: She had seen photos of how the yard once looked.
bilingual.target: 她看过院子以前的照片。

bilingual.source: We chat and relax in the yard with black tea and biscuits.
bilingual.target: 我们在院子里喝红茶吃饼干，聊天放松。

bilingual.source: In the yard, a lovely young girl was drawing water from a well.
bilingual.target: 在院子里，一个可爱的年轻女孩正在从井里打水。

bilingual.source: This fence separates our yard from the neighbor's yard.
bilingual.target: 这道栏栅把我们的院子和邻居的院子隔开了。

bilingual.source: The dog is ing in the yard.

list.abstract: yard（英 [jɑːd]，美 [jɑːrd]），英语单词。作名词为帆桁；横杆；庭院。作动词为把…堆放（或运至）场内；把…驱入圈栏；冬令集居。例句：I chose (选择) the biggest ant in the yard and followed it（我挑了院子里最大的一只蚂蚁，跟着它走）. 近义词有courtyard，garth。

yingyinNormal.en: What backyard? Mouse lives in a yard in TV?
yingyinNormal.zh: 哪个后院？在电视里老鼠活在院子里吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It's just I put a lot of work into this yard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是这院子我也费了好多心。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't you love the huge yard? And the fireplace in the bedroom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你喜欢那个大院子吗？还有睡房里的壁炉。

yingyinNormal.en: Then, one afternoon, I was coming into the front room to read when I heard a noise in the yard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一天下午我到前厅看书，听见院子里有响声。

yingyinNormal.en: I could help you cross the street. No. I could help you cross your yard? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以牵着你过马路。不需要。我可以帮你穿过院子? 不用。

yingyinNormal.en: Now you just feel guilty because of the whole egg thing. Yeah, and I insulted her yard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是因为扔鸡蛋的事有负罪感。嗯，我还侮辱她的院子了。

yingyinNormal.en: A bird. Big eyes. Every night it sneaks into my yard and gobbles my poor azaleas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一种长着大眼睛的鸟，每天晚上它都会偷偷钻进我的院子，吞掉我可怜的杜鹃花。

yingyinNormal.en: But there are systems in place here. You can't just keep him like a bunny you found in the yard. That's crazy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但还有制度管着呢，你总不能把他当作一只院子里捡到的兔子留下吧，那也太扯了。

yingyinNormal.en: I guess the yard work was starting to get to him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 估计是修整院落让他过于劳累。

yingyinNormal.en: Standing here in the yard brings memories flooding back for me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 站在校园中，记忆仿佛泉涌。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: And whenever she was in her yard, Grandpa was always there with her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等她回到家里，外公又总是陪着她。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Juli, I mean, look at your back yard. It's a complete mess. It's, like, covered in turds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 朱莉 你瞧瞧你家后院 乱得不像话，到处都是鸡粪。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, carb up, buddy. Tackle these pancakes like it's fourth and goal on the one-yard line.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，孩子，补充碳水化合物。干掉这些煎饼，如球赛到拼死一战的阶段一样。

yingyinNormal.en: My Asian granddaughter takes a hip-hop class? Why are we not talking about this in the front yard?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的亚洲孙女在学黑人音乐嘻哈吗？我们为什么不去前院聊这件事呢？

yingyinNormal.en: We're all castoffs here. We've been dumped, donated, yard sales, second-handed and just plain thrown out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都是弃儿，被抛弃，被捐赠... 宅前贱卖，二手交易 甚至赤裸裸地被丢弃

yingyinNormal.en: Best friends since childhood, Bucky Barnes and Steven Rogers were inseparable on both school yard and battlefield.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巴奇巴恩斯和史蒂夫罗杰斯从小就是好朋友，两人形影不离，无论是在校园里还是在战场上。

yingyinNormal.en: You're a chef who took 19 hours to make one loaf of bread. Stephen Hawking was more successful at the 100-yard dash.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可是一个大厨，居然花了19小时做一个面包，史蒂芬霍金跑百米冲刺都比你行。

yingyinNormal.en: The work was slow, complicated, and cramped. This is how ships are built today, in hundreds of separate pieces, spread out across the yard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个工作缓慢而复杂，这是现在的方法船的几百个部件被分在不同的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: So these mountains of junk are actually raw materials. And they're so important that this scrap yard was built right here to feed that steel mill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以这些成山的废物，他们其实是原材料，它们真的很重要，这废料场建在这里把钢再碾磨。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 院子; 庭院; 花园

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an area outside a building, usually with a hard surface and a surrounding wall
sense_info_list.zh: 院子; 庭院; 花园

sense_info_list.en: a unit for measuring length, equal to 3 feet (36 inches) or 0.9144 of a metre
an area of land used for a special purpose or business
a long piece of wood fastened to a mast that supports a sail on a boat or ship

examination_example.sentence: It's possible to drive in minutes from sleek (光亮的) office towers where people pitch ideas to single-family with orange trees in their <highlight>yards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从时尚的办公大楼开车几分钟就可以到达，人们在那里向院子里种着橘子树的独栋家庭推销自己的创意。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Mary's sister, Frances Todd Wallace, often came over to plant flowers in the front <highlight>yard</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玛丽的姐姐Frances Todd Wallace经常来前院种花。

examination_example.sentence: I also water the flowers in the <highlight>yard</highlight> and tidy up my own bedroom whenever necessary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还在院子里浇花，并在必要时整理自己的卧室。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: At last, we chose an old sandbox (沙坑) in our front <highlight>yard</highlight> to become our garden.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，我们选择了前院的一个旧沙坑，作为我们的花园。

examination_example.sentence: He worked hard and often kept the <highlight>yard</highlight> clean without any grass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他工作认真，总是把院子打扫得干干净净，没有一点杂草。

examination_example.sentence: A small boy was trying to move a big wooden box out of his <highlight>yard</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个小男孩正试着把一个大木箱搬出院子里。

examination_example.sentence: B. The tubes were placed one <highlight>yard</highlight> apart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 管子被放置在相隔一码的地方。
